K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:340a-0: @340a byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:341a-0: tshangs pa dung la sogs pa tshangs ri @341a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:341a-1: kyi lha'i bu du ma dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:341b-0: rdzu 'phrul mngon par shes pa'i 'od zer rnams kyis ma tshor bar phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing @341b rnams khyab par snang bar byas shing /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:342a-5: gang gis 'khor 'dir the tshom skyes gyur de'i //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:342a-14: bskal pa du ma nas 'gro ba'i don mthar phyin pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:342a-20: sems can kyi khams thams cad la zhi ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:344b-11: bdag nges par myur du 'dus ma byas kyi khyim du 'jug par gyur cig /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-0: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs @351b dbang phyug gis de la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-1: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig snying po 'di brjod cing 'dzin na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-3: de ltar yi dam bcas nas bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-4: zas dus dus su bza' ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-6: sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-7: rtag par rgyun du rgyun mi 'chad par gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-8: gtsang mar gnas pas gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-10: gos gtsang ma bgos la lha'i ba dan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-14: gtor ma la sogs pas mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-15: sems rtse gcig tu gzung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-16: yang dag pa ma yin pa la brtag par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-17: zhes de skad ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-19: 'on tang byang chub sems dpa' nyi 'od dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-20: byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-21: lha'i drang srong du ma yang der 'gro ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-22: dbang byed cing dngos grub kyang sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:351b-23: kho bos kyang de'i tshe mig stong gis sgrub pa po de la blta'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352a-3: yi ge rnams len cing 'dzin kyang nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352a-4: gzhan mu stegs can thams cad kyi chos dbang du bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352a-5: rig byed rnams kyang nges par rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352a-6: gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin pas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352a-7: 'jig rten na 'byung pos phyung ba'i nad kyi rnam pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gang su la byung yang rung sos par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352a-8: des zhi bar mi 'gyur ba'i nad gang yang med do; ;yang 'byung po'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352a-9: lha rnams la yang rgol ba'i mthu yod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352a-10: bdud kyang pham par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352a-11: gzhan mu stegs can rnams kyi phyogs kyang lkugs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352a-12: gal te ri la gnas pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352a-13: dgon pa na gnas pa gang zhig kha ton byed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352a-14: bsam gtan byed pa la de na gnas pa sdigs pa dang bgegs byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352a-15: gnod pa byed pa'i lha dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352a-18: gang la la zhig tshul bzhin du gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352b-23: gang zhig rtag tu dad pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352b-25: rig sngags 'chang la mi g-yel bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352b-26: soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352b-27: lngas rtsen dang ni bde mchog dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352b-28: tsinda la dang su ma la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:352b-29: bingga la dang gshin rje la //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:353a-7: bden pa po dang so brtsegs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:353a-8: mi mjed bdag dang lha mo dpal //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:353b-22: soms shig srung ba gyis shig ces //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:353b-23: chu dang me yi lha rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:353b-24: sha za rnams dang klog dang sprin //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354a-5: gal te sngags pa mi zhig ri dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354a-8: bgegs rnams kyang zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354a-9: gal te ri khrod du lam stor bar gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354a-10: gsang sngags 'di bzlas brjod byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354a-11: bde bar byed pa'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354a-12: klu'i rgyal po de dag mi gzugs kyis de la lam ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354a-15: dgon par son la chu dang me med par gyur na; klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis de la bsrung ba'i phyir chu dang me ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354a-16: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang rig sngags 'chang de la yams kyi nad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354b-0: gnod pa gzhig cing bsal ba'i phyir zhi bar byed pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di @354b dag smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354b-1: gal te 'brog dang ri khrod rnams shig tu //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354b-3: sbrul dang rtsangs pa dang ni mkha' 'gro ma //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354b-5: rgya mtsho chu klung mtsho bran 'gram gnas na //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354b-17: gal te dug can nags sam khyim gang na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354b-18: dug can zas yod der ni son gyur la //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354b-21: gal te bud med bus thogs mi phyin cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:354b-22: g-yon can bgegs kyis na bar byed na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355a-0: dad pa drag pos gsang sngags @355a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355a-2: 'byung po 'bros shing bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355a-3: 'byung po sdang dang gnod sems klu rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355a-4: gsad pa'i ched du gnod pa byas na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355a-5: dad pas gsang sngags 'di ni brjod byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355a-6: tshe yang 'phel zhing nad rnams 'byang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355a-7: gal te 'byung pos skrangs nad byas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355a-8: bal blngags nad dang shu ba rnag khrag can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355a-9: dad pas rtag tu gsang sngags 'di bzlas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355a-10: gsang sngags mthu yis thams cad med par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355a-11: sems can rab tu sdang bas gsad pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355a-12: g-yo dang sgyu yi las rnams byed na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355a-13: dad pa drag pos gsang sngags 'di brjod na //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355b-2: sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangg'a'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355b-3: gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgom par byed la yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba de dag la myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355b-4: gang dag sangs rgyas nyid du sems ma bskyed pa de dag kyang byang chub tu sems bskyed par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355b-5: gang nyan thos kyi 'bras bu ma thob pa de dag kyang myur du thob par byed do; ;stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na lha'i drang srong gang dag byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa ji snyed 'khod pa de dag kyang sems bskyed par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355b-6: gang theg pa chen po'i chos la dbang po rnams dad pas ma rnyed pa de dag kyang thob par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355b-7: snying po 'di'i mthus theg pa chen po la thar pa'i sa bon gyi myu gu 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355b-8: gal te dgos pa zhig yod na yang kho bo'i snying rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:355b-9: thabs la mkhas pas thams cad 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356a-1: gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mun pa mun nag gi sems can dmyal ba dag na sems can gang dag gnas pa rnams kyang gal te snying po 'di thos na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356a-4: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356a-5: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rnams kyang rang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356a-6: nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi sems can gang dag gis snying po 'di lan gcig thos na drang po'i sems kyi bsam pas mos shing sgom par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356a-7: dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356a-8: gal te de ltar bzod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356a-9: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang na yod pa'i ri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356a-13: ri khor yug rnams kyang g-yo zhing rdul phra rab bzhin du phye mar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356a-14: rgya mtsho chen po bzhi yang khol zhing 'thor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356b-0: gal te de dang @356b de'i gam yo na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad ji ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356b-1: gang gi tshe 'di la dam par gyur pa de dag gis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu tshul khrims dang ldan par byas la snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356b-2: yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356b-3: thog ma med pa'i tha ma'i mtha'i bar gyi sdig pa'i las gang yin pa de dag thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356b-4: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyi nang gi sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356b-10: klu'i rgyal po thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356b-11: mi'am lha gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di kha ton byed pa de 'bab chu'am; rgya mtshor khrus byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356b-12: de na srog chags gang dag 'khod pa la des reg pa de dag gi las shin tu lci ba thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356b-13: tshe phyi ma la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par padma las brdzus te skyes par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:356b-15: drod gsher las skye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357a-1: las skye ba 'dzin par mi 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357a-5: 'dod cing brjod pa lta yang ci smos; rlung gang gis rig sngags 'chang la reg pa'i rlung des sems can gang la la reg par gyur pa'i las lci ba thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357a-6: yang dang yang ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357a-7: rtag tu sangs rgyas 'byung po'i skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357a-8: 'di ltar yang shes par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357a-10: 'chang ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357a-11: bsam gyis mi khyab cing dpag tu med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357a-12: gang la la snying po 'di brjod pa de'i kha nas tshig dge ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357a-13: mi dge ba ci byung yang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357a-18: 'byung po rnams kyis yongs su dag pa'i chos su thos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357a-19: su snying po 'di kha ton byed pa de la thams cad sangs rgyas su 'du shes bskyed cing gus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357b-0: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+g'a'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi rdul phra rab snyed dag gis sdug par dgongs @357b shing yongs su bzung ba de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357b-1: sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi snang bas snang bar 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357b-4: lus 'od zer dang ldan par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357b-5: gang snying po 'dis sems can rnams yongs su skyob pa de snying rje'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357b-6: gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdud pa de chos kyi mdzod du shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357b-7: gang la ting 'dzin brgya stong mngon du snang ba de bsam gtan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357b-8: snyoms par 'jug pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357b-9: gang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis sems can rnams la blta ba de nam mkha'i snying po'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357b-10: gang la rtag tu lha dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357b-11: lha rnams kyis kun tu bsrungs pa de mi 'jigs pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357b-12: gang gi kha nas gzungs kyi sgra rgyun mi 'chad pa de gtam sna tshogs kyi mdzod du shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357b-13: gang yams kyi nad rnam gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357b-14: dus ngan pas chud mi zos pa de rtag tu gnas pa'i mdzod du shes par bya'o; ;gang bdud dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:357b-15: gzhan mu stegs can gyis bar du gcod cing bzlog mi nus pa de'i mi'i sha'i mdzod ji lta ba bzhin ma yin par shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358a-1: rtag tu snying po 'dis sems can thams cad gso bar byed pa de sman gyi rgyal po'i mdzod du shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358a-2: gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba la 'byung ba de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358a-3: mngon par shes par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358a-4: de'i bsod nams kyi ba sngags pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358a-6: gal te rigs kyi bu mir gyur pa zhig yun ring po'i 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis skyo zhing bde ba 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358a-7: des thog mar bas mtha' dben pa'i gnas btsal bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358a-9: gtsang mar mtshams legs par gcad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358a-10: gal te chu la bzlas brjod byas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358a-11: yang na zas sam; thug pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358a-13: bdug pa la so sor lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te spyad na tshe ring por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358a-14: mthu yod par 'gyur ro; ;mtshams gcod nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358a-15: rjes su mthun pa'i chos len pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358a-18: de la mtshams gcad pa'i cho ga ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358b-0: thog mar ral gri la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la dkyil 'khor gcad @358b bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358b-1: yang na chu gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas nas phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358b-4: yang na yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358b-5: yang na ji tsam 'dod pa sems kyis byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358b-6: yang na thal ba gtsang ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te mtshams gcad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358b-7: yang na tshon skud sna lnga pa la bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir bres na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358b-8: thams cad du mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358b-9: cho ga 'dis len cing 'dzin nus par 'gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358b-10: bdag nyid 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358b-11: sus snying po 'di'i ming thos pa de'i bskal pa du ma'i skye ba dang 'chi ba bsags pa'i las lci ba rnams kyang 'byang bar 'gyur na; su 'di rjod cing 'dzin pa lta ci smos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:358b-12: gang zhing 'di rjod cing smra bar nus pa de sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa du ma la mchod cing bsod nams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yin par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359a-0: gal te cho ga 'dis sems can gyi khams sdug bsngal la gnas pa thams cad gdon par byed @359a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359a-3: snying po chen po dang ldan zhing ring po mi thogs par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'thob par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359a-4: rig sngags 'chang des sems can ji snyed mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359a-5: sems can so so la brjod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359a-6: de la gang dag gis thos pa dang byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359a-7: rig sngags 'chang de'i bsod nams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359a-9: brjod mi nus par dpag tu med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359a-10: gal te lus bsdams shing zas dus su za bar gnas la dge zhing drang po'i sems kyis brjod par nus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359a-11: des de'i tshe sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi ched du sngon gyi las rnams bshags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359a-12: bdag nyid kyang de bzhin du bshags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359a-13: gal te de ltar goms shing rgyun mi 'chad par snying po 'di brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359a-14: des tshe 'di la dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359a-17: bsam gtan la blo skye bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359a-18: sa bcu'i 'bras bu thob pa la mi dka' bar gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359a-19: 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chung ngu 'thob pa lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359b-0: ci dang ci @359b 'dod pa rnams de la yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359b-2: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying rje chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359b-3: smon lam chen po zab cing rgya che ba'i stobs kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di'i mthu stobs rgya chen po tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359b-6: yul gang dang gang du yams kyi nad byung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359b-7: yul der gal te rgyal pos chos kyis yul srung zhing rgya che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359b-9: sems can rnams stems las mi gcod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359b-10: nyes pa byung ba rnams la bzod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359b-11: rgyal po des lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus dang ldan par byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359b-12: zhag bdun snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi snying po 'di bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359b-13: yul der yams kyi nad ci byung ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359b-14: lo tog thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359b-15: sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:359b-16: gal te sa ris so sor dgra rgyun du 'ong zhing yul du gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360a-0: mi yongs mi dga' bar gyur @360a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360a-3: chu dus su mi 'bab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360a-4: der zla ba dang nyi ma lam drang por mi 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360a-5: gal te sdig pa'i las de snyed byung na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360a-6: rgyal po des spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360a-7: mig stong dang ldan pa'i gzugs byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360a-8: gang du yams kyi nad byung ba de logs su bzhin bstan te gzhag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360a-9: shin du dad pas bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360a-13: lha'i ba dan sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360a-14: zhal zas ro brgya pas mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360a-15: de nas rgyal po des snying po 'di brjod pa'i phyir nyin zhag bdun du brtson 'grus brtan por gnas byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360a-16: sa ris so sor dgra thams cad de la phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360a-17: rang rang gi yul la dga' bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360a-20: mi yongs dang rgyal bu thams cad kyang byas pa gzo zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360a-22: rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor rnams kyang de la dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-1: char yang dus su 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-3: lo tog rnams kyang mang zhing grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-4: yul na gnas pa sems kyang bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-5: yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-6: gal te khyim gcig tu nad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-7: gnod pa sna tshogs byung ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-8: bdud dang 'byung po g-yon can gnas pas 'khrugs shing smra'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-11: phyi nang gi mi mthun pa chen po'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-12: chung ngu dag byung na de'i tshe spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag pa stong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-13: mig stong dang ldan pa de'i mdun du mchod pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-14: shin tu dad pas snying po 'di lan stong bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-15: gong du smos pa'i gnod pa de dag zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-18: snying po 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-21: kun dga' bo snying po 'di'i ming ni mang du yod do /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-22: gcig ni rgya cher dri ma med pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:360b-23: snying rje chen po thogs pa med pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361a-1: bsngal las yongs su bskyob pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361a-2: tshe 'phel bar byed pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361a-3: ngan 'gro'i lam rnam par 'jigs pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361a-4: las kyi sgrib pa 'joms pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361a-5: bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361a-6: sems kyi rjes mthun par dbang ba zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361a-7: sa gong mar myur du nges par rtogs par byed pa zhes kyang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361a-12: gang snying po drang po 'di ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361a-14: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361a-16: 'od zer dang mig dang lag pa stong yod pa zhes kyang bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu ni dpag tu med cing bsam gyis mi khyab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361b-0: 'das pa'i @361b bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i snga logs su byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361b-1: chos snang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361b-4: smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361b-5: bde ba'i phyir 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361b-7: mi mdzed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361b-8: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361b-10: khyed thams cad kyis de la mchod pa gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361b-11: de la brnyas par ma byed cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361b-12: lha dang mi thams cad kyis rtag tu mchod pa gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361b-14: dge ba'i rtsa ba skye zhing sdig pa du ma yang 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361b-15: lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:361b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:362a-0: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas @362a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:362a-2: su nad sna tshogs kyis btab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:362a-3: nad med par 'dod pa des don yod pa'i zhags pa thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:362a-4: su lto na pa des rin po che lhung bzed thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te bsam par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:362a-5: su 'byung po rnams dang bgegs byed pa'i lha la sogs pa gdul bar 'dod pa des /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:362a-6: rin po che ral gri thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:362a-7: su 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bdud 'dul bar 'dod pa des /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:362a-8: rdo rje thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:362a-9: su dgra tshar gcod par 'dod pa des /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:362a-10: rdo rje can gyi gtun shing thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:362a-11: su thams cad du 'jigs par gyur te bde ba ma thob pa des /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:364a-14: mang du slob par 'dod pa des /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:364a-15: glegs bam thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:364a-16: su tshe 'di nas bzung ste sangs rgyas nyid kyi bar du yid mi ldog par 'dod pa des /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:364a-17: 'khor lo thogs pa'i lag pa la bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:364b-0: su mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sbyin pa rnam @364b pa bzhis 'gro ba tshim par 'dod pas mchog sbyin pa'i phyag la bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:364b-1: su phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams myur du byon te phyag gis mgo la nyug cing lung ston par 'dod pa des /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:364b-6: de la sogs pa 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams rnam pa stong du rig par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:364b-7: mdo tsam zhig bstan pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:364b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:364b-10: khyod kyis snying po 'di ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur bar dge ba'i sems kyis zungs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:364b-11: longs shig rgyas par ston cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:364b-12: de ltar na snying po 'di don chen po byed pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:364b-13: khams gsum na sems can ji snyed 'khod pa'i lus la nad gang dag yod pa de gal te gsang sngags 'dis gso bar byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365a-0: nad med par mi 'gyur ba de gang @365a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365a-2: snying po 'dis shing skam po la bzlas brjod byas na de la yal ga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365a-3: me tog gi snye ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365a-6: sems yod pa'i sems can bde bar 'gyur ba la lta ci smos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365a-7: 'di la the tshom za bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365a-10: brtag par mi nus shing bsam gyis mi khyab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365a-11: de bas na yon tan rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365a-13: ming yang mi thos na mthong ba lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365a-14: khyod la sogs pa'i 'khor chen po 'di dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365a-17: mi rnams kyi snying po 'di la rjas su yi rang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365a-18: gang gis thos la spong ba de ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365a-19: gangga'i klung dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma'i rdul phra rab snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams spong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365a-20: su zhig snying po 'di la the tshom bskyed cing yid mi ches pa'i mi de ni /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365b-1: rtag tu sangs rgyas mi mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams mi mthong bar shes par bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365b-18: gsum la rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365b-19: sus tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365b-20: de sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365b-21: bgegs byed pa bdud dang mi 'phrad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:365b-22: yams kyi nad rnams zhi bar 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:366a-2: sems can rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:366a-4: sha ma ta te tu su te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:366a-8: parmam n+ya te; aa tu te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:366a-14: gsang sngags 'chang gang du na bar gyur pa der bcing bar bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:366a-21: dge ba thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:366b-9: su zhig byi la'i gdon gyis zin par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:366b-10: pyi la'i mgo rus blangs te bsregs la sa gtsang ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:366b-11: thal ba zhib mo dang bsregs te chus sprus la byi la'i gzugs byas te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:366b-13: ral gri des byi la'i gzugs de brgya rtsa brgyad du gtubs la dum bu re re la yang lan re bzlas brjod byas shing ming nas kyang brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:366b-14: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi ldang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:366b-15: su zhig ha la ha la'i dug zos na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:366b-16: des gu gul gyi bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:366b-17: ga pur cha bsnyams te khron pa'i chu lhag mar ma gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:366b-18: bskol pa khyor gang tsam lus pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367a-0: byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du lan brgya @367a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367a-1: rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367a-4: srog chags au ca lang gas zin par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367a-5: sgo phye la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te rma khar btab na sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367a-6: su zhig sdig pa'i 'chi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367a-7: skur pa 'debs pas mi gzhan la 'tshe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367a-10: spra tshil las de'i gzugs byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367a-11: byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du aur mo'i ral gri la lan brgya rtsa brgyad dus gcig du bzlas brjod byas te snying po brjod la dum bur gtubs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367a-12: de'i ming nas brjod cing lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367b-0: khye'u nu ba'i 'o ma dang sbyar bar bya @367b ste; sbyor ba'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367b-1: bu gsar du btsas pa'i bud med dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367b-3: phag gis ma mthong bar byas la ril bur byas te; byang chub sems dpa' mig stong ldan gyi mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367b-4: gnas dben pa rlung mi 'ong bar 'dug ste nyi ma bdun gyi bar du sman de mi'i 'o ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367b-5: sbrang rtsi dang brdar ba mig tu blugs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367b-7: ling tog med par 'gyur zhing legs par mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367b-8: su grang ba'i rims kyis btab pa'i ched du stag lpags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367b-11: dom lpags sam; spyang lpags la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te grang ba'i rims kyis btab pa la bskon na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:367b-17: su zhig snying na zhing mi dran nam /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:368a-1: bskol te phyed du ba dang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la 'thungs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:368a-3: bud med kyis bskol bar mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:368a-4: su zhig 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:368a-5: mi ma yin pas btab pa'i nad kyis btab par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:368a-6: gu gul gyi bdug pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te snar blugs so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:368a-15: lan tshva dkar po bsres la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te nad pa'i mal gyi 'og nas bdug na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:368a-16: nad gtong ba'i 'byung po myur du 'bros te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:368a-17: lus 'jig cing der 'dug mi nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:368a-21: rkang lag 'gul mi nus par gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:368a-22: til mar gyi nang du ru rta btsos la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:368b-0: yang @368b na ba mar gcig pu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:368b-2: bud med la la zhig bu 'byung shin tu dka' na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:368b-3: til mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te lto ba'am /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369a-3: gal te na tshabs che na khyor gang 'thungs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369a-4: srog chags thag pa srig 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369a-5: gal te 'bras drag po byung na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369a-6: ram gyi lo ma brdungs te khu ba btsir la de la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas brjod byas te rma khar gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369a-7: rtsa ba dang bcas te 'byung ngo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369a-9: bong bu'i rtug pa gsar du byung ba btsir te khu ba la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te dgong du nyal kar mig tu blugs na sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369a-10: la la zhig lto ba na na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369a-12: su'i mig la mig nag chags sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369a-15: shing sham mya ka'i lo ma btsir te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369b-0: de'i khu ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la nang du mgron bu bcug ste zhag gcig bzhag la nang par yang lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te mig @369b tu blugs na phan no //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369b-3: las rnams kyang byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369b-4: khyim zhig tu glo bur du gnod pa dag byung na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369b-5: bal po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma sor gnyis kyi tshad du gtubs pa stong rtsa brgyad byas la /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369b-10: yams kyi nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369b-12: sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369b-13: shu dag dkar po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te dpung pa g-yas par thogs na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:369b-17: nyi ma gcig la dus gsum du lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:370a-5: lung tang gi shing la lan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzlas brjod byas la ba mar dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:370a-14: mi thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:370a-15: gang dag nyes byung ste lcags sgrog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:370a-17: phug ron gyi rtug pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te lag pa la yang bsku'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:370b-3: bye ma gtsang ma la lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la me tog kun tu gtor na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:370b-6: chu la bzlas brjod byas te shing rnams la gtor na 'bras bu la mi za'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:370b-9: bdag tshe rabs snga ma'i bsod nams kyis rgyus bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la khyod sems can gyi khams thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed nas bcing ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:370b-11: de'i mthus sems can thams cad sdug bsngal rnams las thar bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:370b-14: zhes lung bstan par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:370b-15: ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya pa tha mar gyur pa na rigs kyi bu'am /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:371a-10: bdag rtag tu der mchi zhing kun tu bsrung bar bgyi ste /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:371b-7: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig rtag tu gzungs 'di 'dzin cing 'chang na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:372a-4: lha dang mi la sogs pa la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:372a-6: zhi bas las kyi lam la sbyor bar nus so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:372a-8: da ngas ye shes kyi phyag rgyas gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:372a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:372a-15: rnam par pham par bgyis so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:372b-2: bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir snying rjes rtsa ba'i gsangs sngags 'di smras so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:373a-46: sam ha ra sam ha ra /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374a-0: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyar ras gzigs dbang phyug yid @374a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374a-8: gar skyes gar skyes kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374a-9: rigs chen por skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374a-10: su zhig snyim pa spos kyis bkang ste 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du gtor la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374a-11: gzungs sngags 'di yang lan bdun brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374a-12: stong gi bsod nams kyi mchog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374a-13: snying rje chen po'i rang bzhin yang 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374b-0: de mi'i 'jig rten 'dir yang stobs chen po yongs su rdzogs pa @374b 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374b-1: su zhig 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gdong du blta zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374b-2: gzungs sngags 'di brjod pa de byang chub sems dpa' mtshan rgyas pa mthong nas sa dri ma med pa yang 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374b-3: 'jig rten na yang snang bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374b-4: tshe gcig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374b-5: ji ltar bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta bur 'chi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374b-6: gar skyes gar skyes kyang sngon gyi tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374b-7: las kyi sgrub pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374b-8: su zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin pa des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374b-9: tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya pa la bslab pa'i gzhi brgyad bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374b-10: gos gtsang ma bgos la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi mdun du'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374b-11: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar tsandan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la der me tog sna tshogs gtor bar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374b-12: bdug pas kyang bdug par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374b-13: mar me yang bud par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:374b-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gus pa bskyed par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375a-0: de'i tshe gzungs sngags 'di yang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas @375a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375a-2: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dkyil 'khor der 'dug ste mtshams med pa la sogs pa las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba ji snyed mchis pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375a-5: yid kyi las rnams kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375a-6: sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyang 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375a-7: 'od zer gyis dbang bskur ba'i stobs kyang 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375a-8: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375a-9: gal te char dbab par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375a-10: gyen du nam mkha' la bltas la gzungs sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na char 'bab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375a-11: gal te sa la bltas te gzungs sngags brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375a-12: sa bon thams cad rnam par brgyar phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375a-13: gal te 'bab chu bskams pa'i shul lam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375a-18: mtsho bran gyi 'gram du mchos te brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375a-19: chu thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-0: nad thams cad kyi don du gzungs sngags brjod de lag @375b pas byabs na sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-1: dran pa nyams pa'i me'i mdun du brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-4: skom pas nyen pa'i mi'i gdong du bltas te brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-5: bkres pa'am skom pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-6: gal te mtshams gcad par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-7: des mtshe'u chu'i nang du zhugs te der mchis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-8: gzungs sngags 'di yi ge ra bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-9: dpag tshad brgyar mtshams bcad par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-10: der nyes pa rnams mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-11: mtshams kun tu srung ba rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-13: lus thams cad bsdu ba'i phyag rgya brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-14: lus drang por 'greng ste rkang pa nye bar mnyam du gshibs la rkang pa g-yas pa yid tsam bskums te lag pa g-yon pa thur du brkyang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-15: gung mo dang srin lag gnyis lag mthil du dgug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-18: mthe'u chung brkyang la lag mthil bkan te gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-19: lag pa g-yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:375b-20: lag pa gnyis ka'i gung mo bkug pa lag pa phrag pa dang mnyam par gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376a-3: lus bsdu ba'i phyag rgya dang po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376a-6: dgra rnams pham par bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376a-7: lam dang po la gnas par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376a-8: phyag rgya 'di bcings la gzungs 'di yang lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bgyi'o; ;na mo ratna tra y'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376a-9: na mo a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376a-12: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376a-18: gang gong du phyag rgya ji skad smos pa de bzhin du lus gnas par bgyis la snying gar thal mo sbyar te sor mo thams cad phan tshun thad kar bsnol la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376a-19: g-yon pa'i sor mo rnams kyis g-yas pa rnams la 'khyud par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376a-20: mdzub mo gnyis gyen du bsgreng la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376a-22: mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs dang po la reg par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376a-26: gzungs thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376b-0: bskal pa du mar che rabs su bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa mi dge ba thams cad 'byang bar @376b 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376b-1: tshe phyi ma la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376b-2: gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas byang chub brnyes par mdzad par brtsams pa'i tshe bdud kyis mtho brtsams pa'i tshe phyag rgya 'dis btul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376b-3: de'i tshe zhi ba'i bde ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376b-5: snyoms par 'jug pa yang brnyes par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376b-6: gzungs sngags 'di yang brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376b-10: ae hye hi pa ra ma shu ma shuddha satv'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376b-11: yang thog mar lag pa g-yas pa 'byin pa ltar bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376b-12: pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376b-13: mgo bor thal mo sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste rtse mo sprad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376b-14: mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs gnyis pa la sbyar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376b-16: chos kyi phyag rgya ste; rnam par grol bar bgyi ba'i slad du bsam gtan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376b-17: snyoms par 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376b-20: sngon de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang mthun par bsgoms te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:376b-21: de'i tshe bsam gtan rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377a-4: 'greng la rkang pa gnyis mnyam par gzhib bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377a-7: mthe'u chung rgyab sbyar te sen mo phrad par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377a-8: mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rtse mo phrad par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377a-9: mthe bong gnyis mdzub mo'i tshigs gnyis pa la reg par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377a-10: lag mthil nang nas sor bcu tsam gyis bkyed la smin mtshams su gzugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377a-12: mig stong gi phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377a-14: gal te phyag rgya 'di bcings la gzungs sngags brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377a-15: skad cig de nyid la 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dkrigs pa bye ba phrag stong mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377a-16: gang dag rig sngags 'chang de dang lhan cig spyod cing grogs su gyur ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377a-17: zhing re re na yang byang chub sems dpa' dkrigs pa bye ba phrag 'bum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377a-18: bzhi stong nyi shu mchis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377a-19: gang dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa des ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377a-21: phyag rgya de'i chos nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377a-23: gang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa de nyid la'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377b-0: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' @377b rnams kyi chos kyi sbyin pa ye shes kyis rtogs par 'tshal ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377b-4: aom bhu sarba tsakshu k'a r'a ya dha ra n'i na dr'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377b-5: yang 'greng la rkang pa mnyam par gshibs te lag pa g-yas pa bkan la sor mo lnga gshibs te brkyang la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377b-6: lag pa g-yon pa yang de bzhin du bgyis te bkan la lag pa g-yas pa'i rgyab la sbyar te snying gar gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377b-8: lag pa stong thams cad bsdus pa'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377b-10: 'dis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377b-11: dgra mchis pa rnams thul lo; ;gzungs sngags ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377b-13: na mo a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377b-15: sarba dushta aom ha ya me sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377b-16: yang 'greng ste rting pa phrad par bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377b-17: lag pa g-yon pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par bgyis te lag pa g-yas pa yang de bzhin du bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377b-18: lag mthil bdag logs su bstan par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:377b-20: ting nge 'dzin rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378a-1: mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378a-2: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378a-3: phyag rgya 'dis thams cad kyang 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378a-4: gzungs kyi rtsa ba'i gsang sngags snga ma na ma sarba dzny'a zhes bgyi ba lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378a-5: yang 'greng la rkang pa nye bar gshibs te lag pa g-yon pa'i srin lag gis mthe bo'i sen mo mnan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378a-6: g-yas pa yang de bzhin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378a-8: gung mo rnams rtse mo sprad la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378a-9: lag rting drang por bsrang ste dgug pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378a-13: de ltar mchis la sngags brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378a-14: lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo gnyis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378a-16: g-yon pa'i mdzub mo gnyis ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378a-18: mgo'i thon 'khor g-yas nas bskor bar bgyi ste; 'bod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378a-24: klu la sogs pa 'khor brgyad bsdu ba'i slad du dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378a-28: aom sarba de ba n'a ga aa na le sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378b-0: phyag rgya snga ma la rtse mo bskyed @378b de lag rting gnyis sbyar ba las yid tsam bzung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378b-5: tshangs pa chos mnyan pa'i slad du dgug pa'i phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378b-15: chos kyi sgo du ma gzung ba'i slad du bsdu ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378b-16: nyi ma spyang kis zin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378b-17: zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe ba mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te phyag rgya 'dis phyag rgyas btab la 'thungs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378b-19: nyin gcig bzhin du chos kyi tshigs su bcad pa khri lobs nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ched du gsungs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:378b-23: yang 'greng ste rkang pa nye bar gshibs la lag pa thal mo sbyar te snying gar bzhag la mthe bong gnyis lag mthil du bkug ste rtsa ba'i sngags chen po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379a-1: dpa' rnams kyi rang rang gi nor bu'i yid bzhin lta bu'i phyag rgya ste dgu pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379a-2: 'dis nges par lha'i gzhal med khang rnams su 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379a-3: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su yang mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379a-4: mchod pa'i don du rin po che brgya stong dag kyang bsam pa bzhin rnyed bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379a-5: su zhig chos kyi sgo 'di'i las bgyid nus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379a-6: de nang par sngar langs la khrus bgyi zhing kha gdong bkrus te phyag rgya de'i dam tshig bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379a-7: des phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379a-8: bskal pa du mar tshe rabs su bsags pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las lci ba rnams 'byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379a-9: phyag rgya de'i yon tan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379a-10: bsngags pa rab tu mang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379a-11: yang snga ma bzhin du thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo gnyis bkug la mthe bo'i sen mo la bcar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379a-12: mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo yang phan tshun du rgyab sprad la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379a-13: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems la 'dod pa'i phyag rgya ste bcu pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379b-0: ci 'tshal @379b pa de bzhin du 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379b-1: nges par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379b-2: yang thal mo snga ma las mthe bong dang; mdzub mo so sor brkyang ste lag mthil dbye bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379b-3: 'di ni rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bdag la stsal ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379b-4: 'dis bdag byang chub kyi lam rab tu rtogs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379b-5: 'dis rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379b-6: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya ste bcu gcig pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379b-7: yang thal mo snga ma las mdzub mo gnyis bskum zhing brkyang bas bskul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379b-8: 'di byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin rnams 'thob pa'i phyag rgya ste bcu gnyis pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379b-10: aom sarba buddha sa ma ya ae hye hi pa ra ma shuddha satv'a sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379b-11: de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379b-12: lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug pa'i cho ga brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:379b-13: thog mar ri rnams dang nye ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380a-1: gzhi bkra shis pa'i phyogs btsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380a-2: der sa brkos te gseg ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380a-5: mi gtsang ba rnams bsal la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380a-6: dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i ba'i lci ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380a-7: 'jim par bsres te byug par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380a-8: der mchu zheng du khru bcu drug pa'i stegs bu bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380a-10: mtho gang gi tshad du bgyis la sgo bzhi btod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380a-18: de dag gi gam yor rang rang gi 'khor thams cad bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380a-20: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mig stong dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380a-21: lag pa stong dang ldan pa gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380a-22: de'i mdun du khri'u bzhag ste khri'u'i steng du gzungs sngags kyi cho ga gzhag par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380a-23: de la bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380a-24: me tog sna tshogs dkram mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380a-25: lha bshos sna tshogs dbab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380a-26: der mchod pa de rnams bzhag ste sgog pa rnam dgu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380b-1: gal te rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380b-2: nyin gcig bzhin mchod pa thams cad kyang gsar pa gzhan gyis brje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380b-3: cho ga 'dis nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu dngos po thams cad kyis mchod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380b-4: sgrub pa po gang dag sngon mthong ba de dag gis bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380b-5: de sgrub pa po shar phyogs su bltas te 'greng la gzungs sngags snga ma dang po nas bcu gnyis kyi bar du brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380b-6: sangs rgyas kyi mthar phyin gyi bar du skyo bar mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380b-7: thog mar phyag rgya dang po lan gcig bcings la gsang sngags kyang lan bdun brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380b-8: bcu gnyis pa'i bar du yang de bzhin du bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380b-9: der de'i tshe phyir mi ldog pa brtan po'i sems bskyed par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380b-10: cho ga 'dis de bzhin du dgug par bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380b-12: de tshe sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du nges par drang po'i sems kyis drang por bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380b-14: lha thams cad rjes su dran par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380b-15: ji ltar na mdun na mig lam na gnas pa lta bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380b-16: phan tshun gnod pa bgyid pa ma mchis par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:380b-17: dmigs pa gzhan la dmigs par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381a-0: @381a *// de'i tshe rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan stong brgyad cu bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381a-1: 'on tang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug kun dga' bo'i gzugs kyis der mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381a-2: sgrub pa po la ci 'dod ci slong zhes dri zhing phan tshun smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381a-3: sgrub pa pos bdag nyid kyis mchod pa bgyi bar bsam la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381a-4: bdag la ji skad dris pa lan gdab par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381a-5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi don du gzungs sngags kyi rang bzhin 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381a-8: lung bstan pa'i dus lags pa bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381a-9: thugs rje dang ldan pas bdag la nges par thugs rje chen po bskyed du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381a-14: nam zhig na sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381a-15: yongs su skyob par 'gyur snyam du sems so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381a-16: yang 'byung po gnyug mar gnas pa thams cad bdag gis bsgo ba bzhin du gnas par gyur cig snyam du sems so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381b-0: gal te yid @381b la bsam pa 'di thob cing dngos grub de thob na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381b-1: gzhan la mi brjod par bdag nyid kyis 'tshal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381b-6: bslab pa gcig tu gsang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381b-7: su zhig sna tshogs 'tshal ba des aa ga ru nag po'i chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381b-8: rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381b-9: yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i phyag rgya bcu pa yang bcing bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381b-10: 'on tang 'tshal ba yongs su rdzogs par rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381b-11: de'i tshe glegs bam 'di bzhin du sems shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381b-12: su zhig 'di bzhin du mchod pa bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381b-14: gzungs sngags kyi cho ga rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381b-16: su zhig bde ba thams cad thob par 'tshal ba des yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'i phyag rgya dgu pa bcings la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o; ;til nag po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:381b-17: mer bsregs na ci 'tshal ba bzhin du 'grub po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382a-0: ci nas rgyal po dga' bar @382a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382a-2: des rgyal po gnas pa na mchis pa'i shing las lcug ma blangs te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382a-3: rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba der bor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382a-5: gal te sems can sdig pa can rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382a-6: dgra rnams tshar gcod par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382a-7: des shing nim pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mer bsregs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382a-11: 'byung po ma dul ba de'i slad du gu gul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382a-12: yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mer bsregs na; 'byung po thams cad bdag nyid tshul bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382a-14: chab kyis dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bskyes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382a-15: der ba mar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la mer bsregs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382a-17: mar de nyid las nyung zhig nad pa la blud na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382a-19: sngon yul ko bi nang nad byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382a-20: nad pa rnams gdugs gcig gnyis bro 'tshal nas gum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382b-0: de'i tshe dbus kyi yul gyi mi bden @382b gyur ces bgyi ba der mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382b-1: des gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga bgyis nas bsgrags pa dang nad chad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382b-2: 'byung po'i rgyal po yang yul de nas byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382b-3: thams cad kyis kyang 'di'i stobs 'tshal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382b-4: gang du rang gi 'khor du pha rol gyi dmag tshogs mchi ba der thog ma'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bcings la gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382b-5: dgra bo chom rkun rnams bdag nyid ma rungs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382b-6: su zhig tshe zad pa des 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcing par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382b-7: nyin gcig bzhin mchod pa bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382b-8: aa ga ru nag po'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382b-9: gsang sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382b-11: bud med gang zhig bu mi phyin na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382b-12: ba mar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te de la blud na zhi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382b-15: bu mo dag kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382b-16: mtshan mo bzang po sngon gyi bsod nams rnams kyis brgyan cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:382b-17: sems can rnams dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383a-0: mir skyes pa na rtag tu mchod @383a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383a-1: pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing bde ba mchog rnams myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383a-2: su zhig mig na ba des mig stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya bcings la gzungs sngags thams cad kyi phyag rgyas mig la phyag rgyas btab na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383a-4: ji ltar steng gi phyogs kyi lha bde ba myang ba rnams mthong ba de lta bu'i mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383a-6: ri mo bri ba'i cho ga brjod par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383a-7: ri mo bri ba'i ched du ras dkar po bgyis la byang chub sems dpa' mdog 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser lta bu bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383a-8: lag pa stong dang ldan par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383a-9: lag pa so so'i lag mthil na mig re re mchis par bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383a-10: spyin ma mchis pa'i tshon gyis bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383a-11: tshon rtsi yang ka ping tha dad bsra bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383a-12: mgo la rin po che sna bdun gyi cod pan bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383a-14: nyid lag rnams su rgyan gyis brgyan par bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383a-15: yang na ras la byang chub sems dpa' srid du khru gang ba bris te lag pa gnyis bri bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383b-0: gong du smos pa'i lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya lnga pas rig sngags @383b 'chang gis mchod pa bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383b-2: mig stong dang ldan par ma gyur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383b-5: cho ga gzhan te; su zhig chos kyi sgo 'di mchod par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383b-6: thog mar ras la bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383b-9: cho ga snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383b-10: de nas ri mo mkhan bslab pa brgyad bzung ba chab khung sar mchis te slar log nas legs par dkrus pa gtsang mas bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383b-11: tshon rtsi rung bas cho ga bzhin bris la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383b-12: de'i tshe dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383b-13: der smyung ba bgyis la nyi ma nyi shu rtsa gcig tu mchod pa'i las rgya cher bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383b-14: de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gtong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383b-15: de la the tshom mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383b-17: nyi ma lta bu'i 'od kyang bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383b-19: dad pas mi bgyid pa des ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383b-21: byang chub sems dpa' lag pa stong dang ldan pa'i cho ga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:383b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs byung ba'i tshe yang bdag gis bdud 'dul ba'i lus mig stong dang ldan pa sprul pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384a-0: mig re re las kyang sangs rgyas @384a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384a-3: bskal pa bzang po la sangs rgyas stong 'byung ba lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384a-4: lag pa stong las lag pa re re la yang 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po re re sprul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384a-6: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po stong 'byung ba lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384a-7: bdud 'dul ba'i tshogs kyi nang na byang chub sems dpa'i lus ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384a-10: ngas gsang sngags 'di sangs rgyas kyi mthus rgyas par bshad na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384a-11: bskal pa 'das kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384a-12: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das las gsang sngags 'di thos nas rab tu dga' ste yi rang nas bzung ste sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas gzungs sngags 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384a-13: na mo ratna ra shmi tsandra aa la k'a ra m'arga te dza pu n+ya tsakshu ri ba sh'a ya r'a dz'a ya ta th'a ga t'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384b-0: ratna bra bha ratna da ka @384b te sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384b-1: byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzungs sngags 'di brjod nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la thug gi bar du rnam pa drug tu g-yos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384b-3: 'og min gyi lha'i ris na dbang phyug chen po yang mi bde bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384b-4: lha'i gnas der 'jigs pa chen po yang byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384b-5: ngan song du gyur pa thams cad kyang sdug bsngal chen po rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384b-9: de'i tshe sprul pas ngan song du gyur pa'i 'khor chen po la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384b-10: gal te gsang sngags 'di las 'da' zhing 'gras par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384b-11: mgo bo rdul phra rab bzhin du bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384b-14: rgya mtsho chen po skem mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384b-15: lha ma yin gyi dmag pham par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384b-17: sdig pa can gyi mi rnams kyang tshar gcod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:384b-18: nad chen po dag kyang chad par bgyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385a-0: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams @385a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385a-2: rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gsang sngags 'di brjod cing 'dzin pa de'i gzi brjid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385a-3: stobs yun thung dus bshad par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385a-4: gzungs sngags 'di 'chang zhing brjod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385a-9: ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du rgyal po byams par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385a-11: su zhig bdud pham par bgyid par 'tshal ba des bdug pa gtsang ma la rtsa ba'i gsang sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385a-12: su zhig 'di snyam du bdag la sems can thams cad byams par 'tshal ba des so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te 'chos na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385a-14: su zhig bdag gi tshig thogs pa med par 'gyur bar 'tshal ba des shu dag la lan stong rtsa bzlas brjod bgyis la snying gar bskus na 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385a-15: las de dag la yang rtsa ba'i gsang sngags brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385a-16: phyag rgya yang bcing bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385b-0: lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad de sbyar la mthe @385b bong gnyis brkyang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385b-2: ji ltar bdag srung ba de bzhin du gzhan yang srung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385b-4: gang zhig tu mchi na; chab bam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385b-5: thal ba lag par blangs te lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis la bdag gi steng du gtor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385b-6: phyogs bzhir mtshams bcad par yang 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385b-7: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'byung po rnams sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385b-9: log 'dren rnams kyis mtho brtsams par gyur na; bal po se'u'i shing gi lcug ma la gsang sngags bzlas brjod bgyis te dal gyis bzhus na ses par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385b-11: byang chub sems dpa'i so so'i rig pa'i phyag rgya thogs pa med pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385b-15: na ma sarba buddha dharma sam gh'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385b-16: na ma a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva ra sya bo dhi satva sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385b-17: na mo badzra p'a ni sya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385b-22: bra sha ma ni sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:385b-23: log par lta ba gzhan mu stegs can rnams 'dul bar nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386a-0: su zhig dus gsum du gsang sngags 'di lan nyi shu rtsa re re brjod pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba phrag bcu @386a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386a-1: la mchod pa'i las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa bgyis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386a-2: bud med du skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386a-3: 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe ngan 'gro gsum po dag las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386a-4: 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du mchi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis de'i spyi bor phyag bzhag ste 'di skad ces bu ma 'jigs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386a-6: nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'ongs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386a-7: 'dir skyes nas dus ma yin par 'chi bas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386a-8: 'dir 'byung po rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386a-10: 'greng ste lag pa g-yon pa gru mo bkug pa drang por brkyang ste mi 'jigs pa sbyin par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386a-11: lag pa g-yas pa'i mthe bong lag mthil du bkug pa sor mo bzhis mnan te khu tshur 'di rna ba g-yas pa'i gong du bzhag la mdzub mo bsgul bar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386a-14: phyag rgya 'di ni; stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i las rnams 'byang bar bgyid pa'i slad du smras pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386b-1: nyin gcig bzhin dus gsum du bcings la gsang sngags kyang lan bdun bdun brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386b-2: mtshams med pa lnga po dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386b-3: rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po dag kyang 'byang bar bgyid nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386b-4: sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-091-045:386b-5: las kyi rtsa ba thams cad tshig par 'gyur ro //
